name: Penguin Village (itch) (NatelaX)
description:
Welcome to Penguin Village!

 It's an RPG-style sandbox exploration game where you will encounter a variety of characters in need of your assistance as you journey through its world. Some may need assistance finding lost items, while others may need help with daily tasks. As you complete these tasks, you will unlock access to new areas and encounter even more fascinating creatures. Friendly penguins will gift you with stat-boosting items that enhance your gathering or allow you to move faster and outsmart your enemies.
